thread.title: Nike’s HyperAdapt 1.0 Is Re-Releasing This Week
thread.title_full: Nike’s HyperAdapt 1.0 Is Re-Releasing This Week

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Nike’s HyperAdapt 1.0 Is Re-Releasing This Week
text:
Still haven’t been able to get your hands on a pair of Nike’s new, innovative HyperAdapt 1.0 ? Well, you’ll have another chance this week as on Thursday, March 9, the Swoosh will be making available the self-lacing sneaker via draw.
Step into the future. 
The Nike HyperAdapt 1.0 is back and available via the Draw on 3.9. https://t.co/2IxjWizpx1 pic.twitter.com/lzoJQOC0sw 
— Nike NYC (@NikeNYC) March 6, 2017 

Arriving in both “Black/White-Blue Lagoon” and “Metallic Silver/Black-White” colorways, if you are selected via the online process, your pair in your chosen size will be available for purchase and pick up in-store at select locations in NYC, Miami, Chicago, LA, SF and Portland on March 11. Follow @NikeNYC, @NikeMiami, @NikeChicago, @NikeLA, @NikeSF and @NikePortland for instructions on how to enter the draw in your chosen city.
Best of luck!
Subscribe to Highsnobiety’s sneaker chatbot on Facebook to receive lightning quick updates on release dates, sneaker street style, shopping tips and more.
